title: Grade Calculate Download
text: A solution built by a teacher for all teachers.Anyone who has taught at any level knows, a teacher's desk can get out of hand quickly. This was the situation I found my wife in one night. She had misplaced her Easy Grader tool for about the 20th time.This inspired us here at The Muller Avenue Group to build this site for teachers. There are other solutions on the web, but we wanted to make something that was quick, easy, free, and looked really good.This site is built for teachers that are looking for a quick solution to grade tests, papers, quizzes, or anything really. The goal is to provide teachers an easy and mobile friendly way to generate an easy grade chart.If you have any suggestions about things you would like to see in this site, please let us know.
